field1: A wounded beast lies in a clearing. It can barely move. Its tired eyes watch you as you approach.
A painter stands with an easel in a clearing. He is painting a tree on which a knight has been hanged.
Drag marks on the forest floor lead you to a small opening in the ground.
Through the thicket, you see a campfire burning, its flames flickering with green light.
You arrive at a small shady spot in the forest. The ground is crawling with strange-looking mushrooms. They seem to sparkle when touched by sunlight.
A halfling hunter is searching for his hunting dog.
A family of owlbears crosses your path. The cub takes a few steps toward you.
Three mushrooms argue loudly about who is the most poisonous.
A goblin builds a roller coaster out of branches.
An enchanted mirror hangs on a tree and makes sarcastic comments about your appearance.
A group of raccoons plays poker for shiny spoons.
An invisible donkey follows you – its hoof prints are clearly visible.
A talking crow wants to convince you that he is a cursed king.
A deer with golden antlers asks you for directions to the nearest tavern.
A fountain in the middle of the forest murmurs quietly and draws coins from pockets.
A tent with no entrance or inhabitants, but with steaming soup on the fire.
A tree full of colorful doorknobs, but no doors in sight.
A cart full of gnomes is stuck in the mud – they are arguing about who is to blame.
A moose with a lantern on its antlers trots past you in silence.
A group of fairies has set up a tiny theater and asks you to be the main actor in a love drama.
A mushroom circle pulsates gently. When someone enters it, their hair changes color.
An inverted waterfall rises into the sky – its origin is unclear.
A witch's broom leans against a tree, with a sign: "Back in 5 minutes."
Three hooded goats claim to be protecting an ancient artifact – it is a soup pot.
A small redcap sits on a rock, whispering to a crow. As you come closer, it glances at you and quickly hides behind the rock.
Thick spider webs block the way into a cave. Something large has been entangled inside.
A wounded traveler is strangeled by a vine.
An overgrown church stands abandoned on a small hill. Suddenly, the church bells ring out.
A smug leprechaun taunts the PCs from a high branch.
Suddenly, the forest falls silent. You suddenly feel like you're being watched from all sides.
You hear the bushes rustling around you. Something is coming toward you.
